description: List project transport plan event times with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Available to users within the policy scope of related project transport plan events (scope is limited to project transport plan events the user is authorized to access).
validation_notes: Date/time filters (--at-min/--at-max, --start-at-min/--start-at-max, --end-at-min/--end-at-max) must be ISO 8601. --kind must be one of: planned, expected, actual, modeled. --is-at expects true/false. Legacy filters --at-min/--at-max/--is-at apply to the deprecated at timestamp; --project-transport-plan-id joins through project transport plan events.

flags.name: --project-transport-plan-event
flags.description: Filter by project transport plan event ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --changed-by
flags.description: Filter by changed-by user ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --project-transport-plan
flags.description: Filter by project transport plan ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --project-transport-plan-id
flags.description: Filter by project transport plan ID (legacy filter)

flags.name: --at-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum at timestamp (ISO 8601, legacy)

flags.name: --at-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum at timestamp (ISO 8601, legacy)

flags.name: --is-at
flags.description: Filter by presence of at timestamp (true/false, legacy)

flags.name: --kind
flags.description: Filter by time kind (planned, expected, actual, modeled)
